author: Special Correspondent
text:
Bharatiya Janata Party, Puducherry unit will take rally on Thursday laying emphasis on inducement-free polling in the forthcoming Assembly elections.

The awareness rally will begin from Saram at 4 p.m and end on Beach Road.

The organisers has planned to canvass the public not to fall prey to inducements, freebies which have been distributed at their door steps by political parties other than BJP.
title: BJP to focus on inducement-free elections
